Mewdeko Docs

Class Permissions

Defines permission-related commands, including user, channel, and server blacklist operations.

Permissions(DbService, InteractiveService, GuildSettingsService)

A module for managing permissions for commands.

Declaration
public Permissions(DbService db, InteractiveService inter, GuildSettingsService guildSettings)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DbService db

The database service.
InteractiveService inter

The interactive service.
GuildSettingsService guildSettings

The guild settings service.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AllCatMdls(PermissionAction, ICategoryChannel)

Adds or removes permissions for all modules in a specific category.

Declaration
[Cmd("AllCatMdls")]
[Aliases("AllCatMdls")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task AllCatMdls(PermissionAction action, ICategoryChannel chnl)
Parameters
Type Name Description
PermissionAction action

The action to perform (enable/disable).
ICategoryChannel chnl

The category to set permissions for.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method allows setting permissions for all modules in a specific category.

PermRole(IRole?)

Sets the role that will be used for permissions. If no role is provided, it will show the current permission role.

Declaration
[Cmd("PermRole")]
[Aliases("PermRole")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[Priority(0)]
public Task PermRole(IRole? role = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IRole role

The role, if any, to set as the permissions role
Returns
Type Description
Task
| Edit this page View Source

Verbose(PermissionAction?)

Sets whether commands should throw an error based on what the issue is when using a command.

Declaration

[Aliases("Verbose")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Verbose(PermissionAction? action = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
PermissionAction action

Just a true or false thing. Kinda useless since its a toggle anyway.
